Opposition to Darwin’s book gradually grew stronger. He grew exhausted trying to persuade those who objected to his theory.Around the time the heated debate over evolution reached its peak, Darwin and his family took a vacation.

His daughter Henrietta had been ill, so they went to visit a relative so she could recuperate.

That leaf

is eating

an insect!

It’s called a pitcher plant. They’re carnivorous.

You mean there are carnivorous plants?

Darwin,

The Great Scientist
